articles.author: John Power, Erin Hale
articles.title: Trump moves to deport Indian pro-Palestinian Georgetown University student - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Badar Khan Suri detained by Department of Homeland Security after being designated for removal.
articles.content: An Indian postdoctoral researcher at Georgetown University who has been linked to pro-Palestinian activism online is facing deportation after being detained under United States President Donald Trump… [+4160 chars]
